SEARCH
Package ch.hevs.isi.field

Class ModbusAccessor

java.lang.Object
ch.hevs.isi.field.ModbusAccessor
public class ModbusAccessor extends Object
Singleton class for accessing and interacting with Modbus registers.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ModbusAccessor getInstance(String ip, int port, int slaveId)
      Gets the singleton instance of ModbusAccessor, initializing it if necessary.
      Parameters:
      ip - the IP address of the Modbus device
      port - the port number of the Modbus device
      slaveId - the slave ID of the Modbus device
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of ModbusAccessor

    • getInstance

      public static ModbusAccessor getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance of ModbusAccessor. Must be called after the instance has been initialized with the parameters.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of ModbusAccessor

    • readBoolean

      public boolean readBoolean(int address)
      Reads a boolean value from the specified Modbus address.
      Parameters:
      address - the address to read from
      Returns:
      the boolean value at the specified address

    • readFloat

      public float readFloat(int address)
      Reads a float value from the specified Modbus address.
      Parameters:
      address - the address to read from
      Returns:
      the float value at the specified address

    • writeFloat

      public void writeFloat(int address, float value)
      Writes a float value to the specified Modbus address.
      Parameters:
      address - the address to write to
      value - the float value to write

    • writeBoolean

      public void writeBoolean(int address, boolean value)
      Writes a boolean value to the specified Modbus address.
      Parameters:
      address - the address to write to
      value - the boolean value to write
